QuestData.Title: The Grove of Creation
QuestData.Description: I probably would have been digested if not for you. And while that sounds like a fascinating phenomenon, I am glad I did not experience it... firsthand.$b$bYou have a knack for solving problems and you're not afraid to get your hands dirty with our tools. Might I suggest paying a visit to Glitterfall Basin, to the west? It is home to our finest minds and workshops, and I am sure they could use your help in this drought.$b$bThe Lady of the Falls is droman there. She will know where you can best help!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with the Lady of the Falls in Glitterfall Basin.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with the Lady of the Falls in Glitterfall Basin.
